alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 24 at 7:54AM MDT until July 24 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY WILL CREATE CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS THIS EVENING... .Gusty southwest winds will increase across Southwest Idaho and Southeast Oregon, especially near the Nevada border and on ridgetops, during the afternoon and evening hours with very low relative humidity. This will result in critical fire weather conditions. The strongest winds will arrive this afternoon and evening ahead of a cold front. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT /8 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...BURNS BLM AND VALE BLM...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423...636 AND 637... * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity values of 6 to 12 percent.
